parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: Name of face group to delete

title: ISMNormalCutFeatureData2.DeleteGroupByName

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: Name of face group to delete

returns: True if deletion successful, false if not
remarks:
Use
ISMNormalCutFeatureData2::GetGroupNames
to populate GroupName.
You cannot delete a group, if it is the only group that exists.
